word:
I feel sure that there have been feelings and motives at work in this matter which God has nothing to do with, if my dreams are correct. Time will reveal what now is not so plain. But no more call will be made to those who have been mentioned. God will send by whom He will. The cause is His. The work is His. If any 


                                     -250- 

one has been held back from answering to the Spirit of God in their movements, I am sorry, but we leave this matter for God to settle.
